languages.text: Где-то в недрах Прорвы находится "удушитель" — устройство, мешающее силам Хаоса проникнуть в Темный город. Нужно отыскать и сломать его.
Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.
languages.original_text: Где-то в недрах Прорвы находится "удушитель" — устройство, мешающее силам Хаоса проникнуть в Темный город. Нужно отыскать и сломать его.

traits.locale_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler that stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

languages.text: 在裂隙深处的某个地方，有一台被称为“抑制器”的装置，它可以阻止混沌势力入侵黑暗之城。必须摧毁这台装置。
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 在裂隙深处的某个地方，有一台被称为“抑制器”的装置，它可以阻止混沌势力入侵黑暗之城。必须摧毁这台装置。

languages.text: Irgendwo in den Tiefen der Kluft liegt das Gerät, das als "Drossler" bezeichnet wird und die Mächte das Chaos daran hindert, die Dunkle Stadt zu überwältigen. Dieses Konstrukt muss zerstört werden.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Irgendwo in den Tiefen der Kluft liegt das Gerät, das als "Drossler" bezeichnet wird und die Mächte das Chaos daran hindert, die Dunkle Stadt zu überwältigen. Dieses Konstrukt muss zerstört werden.

languages.text: Quelque part dans les profondeurs de l'Abîme se trouve le carcan, l'appareil qui empêche le Chaos de submerger la Cité Crépusculaire. Il faut impérativement le détruire.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Quelque part dans les profondeurs de l'Abîme se trouve le carcan, l'appareil qui empêche le Chaos de submerger la Cité Crépusculaire. Il faut impérativement le détruire.

languages.text: En algún lugar del Abismo se encuentra el dispositivo conocido como el supresor, que evita que las fuerzas del Caos arrasen la Ciudad Siniestra. Debe ser destruido.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: En algún lugar del Abismo se encuentra el dispositivo conocido como el supresor, que evita que las fuerzas del Caos arrasen la Ciudad Siniestra. Debe ser destruido.

languages.text: 裂け目の深淵のどこかに、スティフラーと呼ばれる装置がある。フォース・オブ・ケイオスが仄暗き都を制圧するのを阻止する装置だ。これを破壊する必要がある。
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 裂け目の深淵のどこかに、スティフラーと呼ばれる装置がある。フォース・オブ・ケイオスが仄暗き都を制圧するのを阻止する装置だ。これを破壊する必要がある。

languages.text: Yarık'ın derinliklerinde bir yerde, Kaos güçlerinin Kara Şehir'i ele geçirmesini engelleyen ve baskılar olarak bilinen bir cihaz bulunur. Bu yapı yok edilmeli.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the depths of the Chasm lies the device known as the stifler, which stops the forces of Chaos from overwhelming the Dark City. This construct must be destroyed.
